name: $required
desc: Returns: Whether or not the test execution will require the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution will require the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

name: $validated
desc: Returns: Whether or not the test execution will validate the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution will validate the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

name: $description
desc: Returns: Description of the capabilities that this test script is requiring the server to support.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Description of the capabilities that this test script is requiring the server to support.

name: $origin
desc: Returns: Which origin server these requirements apply to.

name: $addorigin
desc: Which origin server these requirements apply to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Which origin server these requirements apply to.

name: $destination
desc: Returns: Which server these requirements apply to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Which server these requirements apply to.

name: $link
desc: Returns: Links to the FHIR specification that describes this interaction and the resources involved in more detail.

name: $addlink
desc: Links to the FHIR specification that describes this interaction and the resources involved in more detail.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Links to the FHIR specification that describes this interaction and the resources involved in more detail.

name: $capabilities
desc: Returns: Minimum capabilities required of server for test script to execute successfully.   If server does not meet at a minimum the referenced capability statement, then all tests in this script are skipped.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Minimum capabilities required of server for test script to execute successfully.   If server does not meet at a minimum the referenced capability statement, then all tests in this script are skipped.
